pr_title: [Plugin] Add timeout of connection when downloading the plugins from URL

timeline.message:
[Plugin] Add timeout of connection when downloading the plugins from HTTP.

If no timeout is set, the download process may be blocked forever.

timeline.bodyText:
Should be static const value.
If the timeout isn't a config, I think set a larger value maybe better when the plugin resource is big and network is poor.
timeline.author: kangkaisen

replies.bodyText: I change it to a config
replies.author: morningman
